titles.title: 558 Nearer My God To Thee (easy familiar)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
E
Verse 1
Nearer my God to Thee
Nearer to Thee
E'en though it be a cross
That raiseth me
Still all my song shall be
Nearer my God to Thee
Nearer my God to Thee
Nearer to Thee

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Though like the wanderer
The sun gone down
Darkness be over me
My rest a stone
Yet in my dreams I'd be
Nearer my God to Thee
Nearer my God to Thee
Nearer to Thee

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There let the way appear
Steps unto heav'n
All that Thou sendest me
In mercy giv'n
Angels to beckon me
Nearer my God to Thee
Nearer my God to Thee
Nearer to Thee

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Then with my waking thought
Bright with Thy praise
Out of my stony griefs
Bethel I'll raise
So by my woes to be
Nearer my God to Thee
Nearer my God to Thee
Nearer to Thee

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Or if on joyful wing
Cleaving the sky
Sun moon and stars forgot
Upward I fly
Still all my song shall be
Nearer my God to Thee
Nearer my God to Thee
Nearer to Thee
